definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: I hitchhike from Tianjin to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 我從天津搭便車去北京。

sentences.english: Yesterday, I hitchhiked my way to a small village several miles away from London.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我一路搭乘便車去離倫敦幾英里外的一個小鎮。

sentences.english: I hitchhiked from Tianjin to Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 我從天津搭便車去北京。

sentences.english: Evidently we have to hitch a passing car.
sentences.chinese: 看來我們得招手搭便車了。

sentences.english: Freeriding is a sport that has just recently come into vogue .
sentences.chinese: 搭便車是一個最近剛剛成氣候運動。
他中途讓一個搭便車的人上了車。

sentences.english: Sternly, he demanded to know what my parents thought about my hitchhiking.
sentences.chinese: 他很嚴肅地想要知道我的父母怎麼看待我搭便車的。

sentences.english: He hitchhiked to Dover and, towards evening.
sentences.chinese: 他搭便車到了多佛，天快黑時。

sentences.english: Now and then, someone gave him a ride , but most of the way he walked.
sentences.chinese: 偶爾有人會讓他搭個便車，但絕大部分路他得自己走。

sentences.english: The younger man would regularly hitch into Salton City to do his laundry and barbecue steaks at Franz's apartment.
sentences.chinese: 年輕人定時搭便車到沙爾頓市弗朗茲的公寓洗衣烤肉。

sentences.english: A:I like hitchhiking.will you go with me?
And the arbitrary charge was collected from farmers under the veil of agricultural tax.
sentences.chinese: 而這些亂收費就是搭着農業稅的便車向農民徵收的。

sentences.english: While driving alone at night you see an old man hitch-hiking. What would you do?
sentences.chinese: 深夜開車回家時路旁老人要求搭便車，我怎麼做？

sentences.english: In experimental settings, people were subjected to free-riders who exploited them.
sentences.chinese: 在一項研究中裏，人們屈從於搭便車者的剝削。

sentences.english: Her car broke down, so she had to hitchhike back home.
sentences.chinese: 他的車壞了，所以他只有搭便車回家。

sentences.english: Before this, I never understood why anyone hitchhiked.
sentences.chinese: 這之前，我一直不能理解爲啥有人要搭便車。

definition: vehicle/(more specifically) mobility vehicle (mobility scooter, electric wheelchair, Segway etc)
(of two vehicles traveling in opposite directions) to pass by each other
abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线/chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
to drive a vehicle for its owner (often as a paid service for sb who has consumed alcohol) (abbr. for 代理駕駛|代理驾驶[dai4 li3 jia4 shi3])/substitute driver (abbr. for 代駕司機|代驾司机[dai4 jia4 si1 ji1])
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
to swear while talking/to be foul-mouthed
